environment_variables.FLUXIONPath: Path to directory containing the FLUXION executable script.
environment_variables.FLUXIONLibPath: Path to directory containing the FLUXION library (scripts).
environment_variables.FLUXIONWorkspacePath: Path to the temp. directory available to FLUXION & subscripts.
environment_variables.FLUXIONIPTablesBackup: Path to FLUXION's iptables backup file.
environment_variables.FLUXIONPreferencesFile: Path to FLUXION's preferences file, to be loaded afterward.
environment_variables.FLUXIONNoiseFloor: Constants denoting the reference noise floor level.
environment_variables.FLUXIONNoiseCeiling: Constants denoting the reference noise ceiling level.
environment_variables.FLUXIONSkipDependencies: Allow to skip dependencies if required, not recommended.
environment_variables.FLUXIONMissingDependencies: Check if there are any missing dependencies.
environment_variables.EUID: User ID of the script execution.
environment_variables.FLUXIONCLIArguments: Command line arguments passed to FLUXION.
environment_variables.FLUXIONOutputDevice: Output device for FLUXION (debug log or /dev/null).
environment_variables.FluxionTargetMAC: MAC address of the target access point.
environment_variables.FluxionTargetSSID: SSID of the target access point.
environment_variables.FluxionTargetChannel: Channel of the target access point.
environment_variables.FluxionTargetEncryption: Encryption type of the target access point.
environment_variables.FluxionTargetMakerID: Maker ID of the target access point.
environment_variables.FluxionTargetMaker: Maker of the target access point.
environment_variables.FluxionTargetSSIDClean: Sanitized SSID of the target access point.
environment_variables.FluxionTargetRogueMAC: MAC address of the rogue access point.
environment_variables.FluxionHashPath: Path to the handshake capture file.
environment_variables.FluxionTargetTrackerDaemonPID: Process ID of the target tracker daemon.
environment_variables.FluxionDone: Last executed instruction in a sequence.
environment_variables.FluxionKillingProcessNotice: Notice indicating a process is being killed.
environment_variables.FLUXIONDeallocatingInterfaceNotice: Notice indicating an interface is being deallocated.
environment_variables.FLUXIONUnblockingWINotice: Notice indicating a wireless interface is being unblocked.
environment_variables.FLUXIONGatheringWIInfoNotice: Notice indicating wireless interface information is being gathered.
environment_variables.FLUXIONUnknownWIDriverError: Error indicating an unknown wireless interface driver.
environment_variables.FLUXIONUnloadingWIDriverNotice: Notice indicating a wireless interface driver is being unloaded.
environment_variables.FLUXIONFindingConflictingProcessesNotice: Notice indicating conflicting processes are being found.
environment_variables.FLUXIONKillingConflictingProcessesNotice: Notice indicating conflicting processes are being killed.
environment_variables.FLUXIONLoadingWIDriverNotice: Notice indicating a wireless interface driver is being loaded.
environment_variables.FLUXIONReidentifyingInterface: Notice indicating an interface is being reidentified.
environment_variables.FLUXIONStartingWIMonitorNotice: Notice indicating monitor mode is being started on a wireless interface.
environment_variables.FLUXIONInterfaceAllocationFailedError: Error indicating an interface allocation failure.
environment_variables.FLUXIONInterfaceAllocatedNotice: Notice indicating an interface was allocated.
environment_variables.FLUXIONStartingScannerNotice: Notice indicating the scanner is being started.
environment_variables.FLUXIONPreparingScannerResultsNotice: Notice indicating scanner results are being prepared.
environment_variables.FLUXIONScannerDetectedNothingNotice: Notice indicating the scanner detected no targets.
environment_variables.FLUXIONScannerChannelQuery: Query for selecting channels to scan.
environment_variables.FLUXIONTargetSearchingInterfaceQuery: Query for selecting an interface to search for targets.
environment_variables.FLUXIONTargettingAccessPointAboveNotice: Notice indicating a target access point was found.
environment_variables.FLUXIONContinueWithTargetQuery: Query asking the user to confirm if they want to continue with the target.
environment_variables.FLUXIONHashFileDoesNotExistError: Error indicating a handshake file does not exist.
environment_variables.FLUXIONHashVerificationMethodQuery: Query asking the user to select a method for verifying the handshake.
environment_variables.FLUXIONHashVerificationMethodAircrackOpt: Option to use Aircrack-ng to verify the handshake.
environment_variables.FLUXIONHashVerificationMethodCowpattyOpt: Option to use Cowpatty to verify the handshake.
environment_variables.FLUXIONHashVerificationMethodPyritOption: Option to use Pyrit to verify the handshake.
environment_variables.FLUXIONHashInvalidError: Error indicating the handshake is invalid.
environment_variables.FLUXIONHashValidNotice: Notice indicating the handshake is valid.
environment_variables.FLUXIONFoundHashNotice: Notice indicating a handshake file was found.
environment_variables.FLUXIONUseFoundHashOption: Option to use the found handshake file.
environment_variables.FLUXIONSpecifyHashPathOption: Option to specify a handshake file path.
environment_variables.FLUXIONHashSourceRescanOption: Option to rescan for handshake files.
environment_variables.FLUXIONPathToHandshakeFileQuery: Query asking the user to provide the path to the handshake file.
environment_variables.FLUXIONPathToHandshakeFileReturnTip: Tip for providing the path to the handshake file.
environment_variables.FLUXIONEmptyOrNonExistentHashError: Error indicating the handshake file is empty or does not exist.
environment_variables.FLUXIONAttackQuery: Query asking the user to select an attack.
environment_variables.FLUXIONAttackResumeQuery: Query asking the user if they want to resume the attack.
environment_variables.FLUXIONAttackInProgressNotice: Notice indicating an attack is in progress.
environment_variables.FLUXIONTargetTrackerInterfaceQuery: Query asking the user to select an interface for target tracking.
environment_variables.FLUXIONTargetTrackerInterfaceQueryTip: Tip for selecting an interface for target tracking.
environment_variables.FLUXIONTargetTrackerInterfaceQueryTip2: Tip for selecting an interface for target tracking.
environment_variables.FLUXIONRestoringTputNotice: Notice indicating tput is being restored.
environment_variables.FLUXIONDeletingFilesNotice: Notice indicating files are being deleted.
environment_variables.FLUXIONRestartingNetworkManagerNotice: Notice indicating network manager is being restarted.
